name: SRUJANEE
briefDescription: SRUJANEE (The Creation) is a Gandhian Ideology based organization   sands in Character of Honesty, Believes in Equality, Working for rural community. Facilitate the process by enabling people to be productive & self reliant. And also involved in the development of Socio-economical status of rural community since 1991.	Health Education & Orientation Programme 	Reproductive & child health programme AIDS Awareness 	TB Reduce Programme 	Mother & child health programme,Filarial dictation 	Cancer dictation camp, Sunstroke Reduction	Pals Polio camp 	Survey for clip-life & clip –palate 	Mobile Health Service	Total Sanitation Programme	Plantation Programme with Environmental activities 	Women Development programme.
